contents.name: Name
contents.description: Represents the name of the Product.

contents.name: ValidationRules
contents.description: Reference to the specific validation rules of the product passport.

contents.name: DataViews
contents.description: Reference to the specific Product View

contents.name: Name
contents.description: Represents the name of the Product Unit Event.

contents.name: Stream
contents.description: Source of the given Event.

contents.name: CreationDate
contents.description: Represents the creation time of the Product Type.

contents.name: LastModifiedDate
contents.description: Represents the last modification time of the Product Type.

contents.name: ItemNumber
contents.description: Represents the item number of the Product Type.

contents.name: ProofState

enumValues.name: NotAvailable
enumValues.description: Proof does not exist (yet).

enumValues.name: Verified
enumValues.description: Proof was successfully build and verified.

enumValues.name: Failed
enumValues.description: Proof was successfully build but the verification failed.

contents.description: Represents the tempering protection State of the Product Type.

contents.name: DataValidationState

enumValues.name: NotAvailable
enumValues.description: No verification was applied to the type.

enumValues.name: Open
enumValues.description: Verification of the product type is still pending.

enumValues.name: ReadyForReview
enumValues.description: Product type was verified but the QA check is still pending.

enumValues.name: Validated
enumValues.description: Product type was successfully validated.

enumValues.name: Failed
enumValues.description: Product type verification failed.

contents.description: Represents the data validation of the Product Type.

contents.name: ProductUnits
contents.description: Reference to the specific product unit of a given type.

contents.name: Configuration
contents.description: Reference to the configuration for a given type.

contents.name: ProductionDate
contents.description: Represents the production time of the Product Unit.

contents.name: SerialNumber
contents.description: Represents the serial number of the Product Unit.

contents.name: ProofState

enumValues.name: NotAvailable
enumValues.description: Proof does not exist (yet).

enumValues.name: Verified
enumValues.description: Proof was successfully build and verified.

enumValues.name: Failed
enumValues.description: Proof was successfully build but the verification failed.

contents.description: Represents the tempering protection State of the Product Type.

contents.name: ValidationState

enumValues.name: NotAvailable
enumValues.description: No validation was applied to the unit.

enumValues.name: Open
enumValues.description: Validation of the product unit is still pending.

enumValues.name: Failed
enumValues.description: Product unit validation failed.

enumValues.name: Validated
enumValues.description: Product unit was successfully validated.

contents.description: Represents the data validation of the Product Unit.

contents.name: Placement

enumValues.name: NotAvailable
enumValues.description: Product Unit is not produced yet.

enumValues.name: Registered
enumValues.description: Product Unit was produced but is not available for the market.

enumValues.name: Placed
enumValues.description: Product unit validation failed.

contents.description: Represents the placement of the unit.

contents.name: QRCodeState

enumValues.name: NotAvailable
enumValues.description: Product State is not validated w/ state valid and ShortUrl is not generated.

enumValues.name: Available
enumValues.description: Product State is validated w/ state valid and ShortUrl is generated.

enumValues.name: Public
enumValues.description: Product State is validated w/ state valid and ShortUrl is generated and ProductUnit is PlacedOnMarket.

contents.description: Represents the public available QR Code for a given Product Unit.

contents.name: LifeCycleState

enumValues.name: NotAvailable
enumValues.description: No life cycle state is available.

enumValues.name: Repurposed
enumValues.description: Product Unit was repurposed.

enumValues.name: Reused
enumValues.description: Product unit is reused.

enumValues.name: Remanufactured
enumValues.description: Product unit was successfully remanufactured.

enumValues.name: Waste
enumValues.description: Product unit is non functional.

contents.description: Represents the current Lifecycle of the given Unit.

contents.name: ProductUnitEvents
contents.description: Reference to the specific event of a given product unit.

enumValues.name: None
enumValues.description: Category does not exist.

enumValues.name: ProductUsage
enumValues.comment: User should not be able to create CO2 Footprint with this category. CO2 Footprint for this category is calculated on backend.

enumValues.name: None
enumValues.description: Category does not exist.

contents.name: Name
contents.description: Represents the name of the Data View.

contents.name: DTMIReference
contents.description: Represents the Digital Twin Model Identifier where the validation rules should be applied to.

contents.name: DataViews
contents.description: Contains all dataviews which should be displayed on the ui for a specific Product Model / Product Unit.

contents.name: Name
contents.description: Represents the name of the Data View.

contents.name: Visibility

enumValues.name: None
enumValues.description: Attribute should not be displayed.

enumValues.name: Private
enumValues.description: Attribute should only be visible for authenticated users.

enumValues.name: Public
enumValues.description: Attribute should be visible for all users.

contents.description: Defines if and where the Attribute should be displayed.

contents.name: DataViewCategories
contents.description: Contains all categories which should be displayed on the ui for a specific Product Model / Product Unit.

contents.name: Name
contents.description: Represents a user friendly name of the UI attribute assignment.

contents.name: FieldDTMI
contents.description: Property DTMI of dtmi:avl:passport:product:type:base;1

contents.name: Name
contents.description: Represents the name of the Data View.

contents.name: Priority
contents.description: Represents the priority of the category for sorting within the UI.

contents.name: DataViewGroups
contents.description: Contains all groups within one category which should be displayed on the ui for a specific Product Model / Product Unit.

contents.name: Name
contents.description: Represents the name of the Data View.

contents.name: Priority
contents.description: Represents the priority of the group for sorting within the UI.

contents.name: DataViewGroupAttributes
contents.description: Contains all attributes (properties, fields) within one group which should be displayed on the ui for a specific Product Model / Product Unit.

contents.description: Defines if the validation is enabled or disabled.

contents.description: Reference to the validation rules which should be applied to the Attribute / Property.

contents.name: Name
contents.description: Represents the name of the Validation Group.

contents.name: DTMIReference
contents.description: Represents the Digital Twin Model Identifier where the validation rules should be applied to.

contents.name: ValidationAttributes
contents.description: Contains all attributes where a validation should be applied to a Product Model / Product Unit.

contents.name: Name
contents.description: Represents a user friendly name of the validation rule.

contents.name: min_date
contents.description: Property date is not allowed to be less than this value. (Min Value Included)

contents.name: min_datetime
contents.description: Property date is not allowed to be less than this value. (Min Value Included)

contents.name: allowed_values
contents.description: Property defines the list of valid enum values.

contents.name: Min
contents.description: Property number is not allowed to be less than this value. (Min Value Included)

contents.name: Max
contents.description: Property number is not allowed to be greater than this value. (Max Value Included)

contents.name: Min
contents.description: Property number is not allowed to be less than this value. (Min Value Included)

contents.name: Max
contents.description: Property number is not allowed to be greater than this value. (Max Value Included)

contents.name: Regex
contents.description: Regex pattern which should be applied to the text.

contents.name: Threshold
contents.description: Limit for a specific Value.

contents.name: ThresholdType

enumValues.name: LowerThresholdAlert
enumValues.description: Alert when the value is below the threshold.

enumValues.name: LowerThresholdWarning
enumValues.description: Warning when the value is below the threshold.

enumValues.name: UpperThresholdWarning
enumValues.description: Warning when the value is above the threshold.

enumValues.name: UpperThresholdAlert
enumValues.description: Alert when the value is above the threshold.

contents.description: Defines at when the Threshold should be applied to.
